name: Bob's Murder
description:
Solve your murder in order to ascend from this Earthly plane!

Game was created in 4 days for the GameDev.TV 2022 game jam. Theme of the jam: "Death is only the beginning".

The game itself is not challenging - my focus was on learning how to do a search mechanic.

The Unity project files can be downloaded from: https://gitlab.com/CJackCandy/bobs-murder
